body_html: You need to use softmax to get a probability distribution. Softmax doesn't change order so it's irrelevant you are just going to argmax immediately but if you want real probabilities you need softmax.
body_text: You need to use softmax to get a probability distribution. Softmax doesn't change order so it's irrelevant you are just going to argmax immediately but if you want real probabilities you need softmax.
body: You need to use softmax to get a probability distribution. Softmax doesn't change order so it's irrelevant you are just going to argmax immediately but if you want real probabilities you need softmax.
